lastSession.summary: Built complete Personal Dashboard web application with React frontend and Express backend using multi-agent orchestration
completedTasks: Created React frontend with Vite, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS
Built 5 widget components: Weather, Notes, Tasks, Pomodoro, QuickLinks
Created Express.js backend with SQLite database
Implemented full CRUD APIs for notes, tasks, links, and pomodoro
Fixed API response format mismatch between frontend and backend
Fixed vite proxy configuration for backend connection
Updated WeatherWidget to use default location instead of requiring geolocation

recentChanges: Fixed WeatherWidget to use London as default location
